value.title: Add or Edit Columns When Importing Data from Analysis Services into Power BI
value.excerpt: If you use SQL Server Analysis Services as a data source for Power BI, you have two types of connection; Live Connection or Import Data. value.title: Age Calculation in Power BI using Power Query
value.excerpt: Power Query has a simple way of calculating the age. However, because DAX is the popular language in many calculations in Power BI, many are not aware of this function in Power Query. value.title: Cartesian Product in Power Query   Multiply All Sets of All Pairs in Power BI
value.excerpt: Sometimes, you need to create a multiplication of all sets of all pairs from two different data tables in Power BI.
